message: Physical changes that always occur when I'm molested.
The first time, it was because that day was so close.
The second time, it was because I was pregnant.
Or rather, I had forced myself to think so.
To concede a hundred steps, it's an unavoidable physiological phenomenon.
Because of something different this time.
The strangely gentle movements of the fingers.
The sensations in response to it.
I even feel terror at its foreignness.
The feeling becomes more blatant as I get wetter.
Stockings are of no use at all.
It feels like I'm being touched directly.
He rubs persistently at the root of my thigh until it's numb.
Of course, I'm not feeling any pleasure.
So much so that it's terrifying to open my eyes and look around.
I'm sure everyone is staring at me.
A strange woman twisting and fidgeting her body.
Her breath sounds almost like moaning.
And she's even making strange sounds.
I feel like I'm going to faint from the extreme embarrassment.
The fact that I'm being heard by strangers.
I can't accept it at all.
Especially the sound of my wet private parts.
Only Shō should know about that.
It's not something to tell everyone.
I don't want to be heard by some stranger.
This time it was the strongest.
A peculiar numbness spread up to around my navel.
From there, it spread out in a gentle ripple.
My body feels light and fluffy.
Like butter melting in my head.
A sensation that I clearly remember.
My face stiffens at the unbelievable premonition.
A state that only I know, just before the end.
It was just like that time, like it was reflected in a mirror.
Could I really be about to climax?
I, clenching my back teeth tightly.
Even though it's midsummer, my body feels like it's going to freeze.
I feel like even the breath I exhale is turning white.
My body is climbing the peak on its own.
Please, I beg you, turn me back.
A struggle against the feelings of resistance.
The strength drains from my legs due to the tingling in my lower abdomen.
I can't stand on my own power anymore.
Shō becomes my lifeline in earnest.
My hand naturally clings to him tightly.
While keeping eye contact with Shō.
With the fingers of the section chief, whom I hate.
